other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates two tiny high T2 signal lesions with sharp borders in segment IVb; gallbladder contains sludge and tiny stones; CBD has a focal nonobstructing filling defect possibly representing sludge; pancreas shows diffuse atrophy with multiple cysts, no pancreatic duct dilatation; spleen has a 2.6 cm well-demarcated cyst; left adrenal nodule measuring 1.7 cm likely representing an adenoma; left kidney shows thin parenchyma and multiple simple cysts, and hemorrhagic/proteinaceous cysts; aorta reveals prominent atherosclerotic disease with aneurysmal dilatation up to 3.3 cm and large mural thrombus.
